context.p: Refer to the transmission manufacturers Service Manual if transmission service or repair is required.

step.cmd: Remove bushings (13) and washers (14) from brackets (18).
Remove bolts (15 and 16) securing brackets (18) on transmission (1) and remove brackets (18).
Remove flange nut (31) and retainer plate (32) securing input flange (33) on transmission (1). Pull input flange (33) from transmission (1).
Pull trunnion (2) assembly from transmission (1) and remove shock mounts (5) and ring (34) from trunnion (2), if required.
Remove flange nut (35) and retainer plate (36) securing output flange (37) on transmission (1). Pull output flange (37) from transmission (1).
